"Shops":
"From the Main Menu, you can accesss the AC/SG Shops, where you can spend AC (\"ARKS Cash\") and SG (\"Star Gems\") on various items, such as costumes, Scratches, and many other things.

In addition, you can use the Item Recycling feature to trade unwanted items from the Scratches for other items."
"The AC/SG Shops have stock that's only available for a limited time before it rotates out, and the Scratch prize lineups are updated regularly, so be sure to check both frequently."
"At the Treasure Shop, you can spend <pict reb_meseta>N-Meseta or <pict StarGem>SG to buy items. The available stock changes every day."

"While the Treasure Shop stock rotates every day, you can also manually refresh it without having to wait.

Valuable items may come up for sale, so be sure to check the stock every day."
